thread.section_title: Travel: late deals & bargains, holiday news and advice - Mirror Online
thread.title: 6 best holiday deals this week: Venice, Florida and Cyprus autumn escapes
thread.title_full: 6 best holiday deals this week: Venice, Florida and Cyprus autumn escapes - Mirror Online

author: Emma Munbodh
title: 6 best holiday deals this week: Venice, Florida and Cyprus autumn escapes
text:
British summer may be drawing to a close, but temperatures are still sizzling above 30 in the Mediterranean, with Greece and Turkey boasting highs of 33 this September.
If you missed out on your summer sunshine fix, you've still got time to book a break, before the autumn chill sets in across Europe, and Christmas market season starts.
If your a holiday bargain-hunter after a cheap break, here are 6 of the best packages this week. For more savings, see our breakdown of the British Airways and Emirates sales - we've spotted packages down to £200 or less.
For family breaks, and October half-term escapes on a budget, see our Eurocamp and Legoland guides.
1. Venice, £189 per person, breakfast included
For £189 per person , spend three-nights at the deluxe Hotel Carlton right on the Grand Canal, including flights and a luxury gondola tour with Travelzoo .
Package includes return flights from London Gatwick, Luton, Southend, Stanstead or East Midlands airport.
You'll stay in a superior double room with daily breakfast included. Depart on selected dates from 8 November 2015-7 March 2016.
2. Florida, £585 per person, breakfast included Spend seven-nights in Florida with Virgin Holidays including flights from London Heathrow, on a bed and breakfast basis this November.
You'll stay at the 3V+ Comfort Suites Maingate East and be provided with a car, for getting around.
Price is per person based on two adults travelling and sharing a one bedroom king suite. Price is based on a departure November 16 2015.
3. Budapest, £119 per person, hotel only WEKWEK
Budapest, the vibrant capital of Hungary, is a living picture of castles and Neo-Gothic grandeur by day, and a pulsating example of European nightlife by night.
This deal offers two or three nights in Hungary's capital, staying at the central Agape Aparthotel which offers easy access to famous historic landmarks of Budapest.
Guests may take a stroll to the historic Lajos Kossuth Square, which plays host to Hungary’s coronation crown and ornate Parliament Building, as well as the Museum of Ethnography’s folk art displays.
Stay for two in standard room arriving between September 2015-March 2016. Depart from London Stanstead or Manchester Airports. Price is £119 per person .
4. Dalaman, £299 per person, all inclusive Getty
British Airways is offering seven nights at the 5-star Green Nature Resort & Spa Hotel, from £299 per person , travelling October 1 - October 31 2015.
The package includes Euro Traveller return flights from London Gatwick and accommodation on an All Inclusive board basis.
5. North Cyprus, £199 per person, breakfast included Getty
Travelzoo is offering a week in glorious Cyprus, staying at the Rose Garden Hotel , on a breakfast board basis for £199 per person . There's also the option to upgrade to half board, with daily breakfast and dinner, for £259 per person.
Surrounded by rose gardens, the hotel is in the village of Lapta, nine miles from the historic port town of Kyrenia - there's a bus service that departs regularly. The nearest beach is a 5-minute drive away.
Depart from London Stansted on select dates between September-November 2015, and March, 2016. Depart from Manchester on 16-23 September 2015.
6. Gran Canaria, £441 per person, half board
Thomson is offering seven-nights in the Gran Canaria staying at Thomson’s 4T+ A La Carte Cordial Mogan Playa on a half board basis from £441 per person.
Price is based on two adults sharing, and includes flights departing from Luton airport on 28 September 2015 and transfers.
To find out more about this holiday or to book visit Thomson Holidays here .
DailyMirror
